snippet: Christopher Jones, the chief executive of a medical device company, sat next to his wife-t0-be on a flight, and the two met in different cities around the globe for two years before getting married.
abstract: Frequent Flier column features GlySure chief executive Christopher Jones discussing his flying experiences.
lead_paragraph: Christopher Jones, the chief executive of a medical device company, sat next to his wife-t0-be on a flight, and the two met in different cities around the globe for two years before getting married.

headline.seo: A Flight Delay That Ended in Marriage
